channel.title: How to make door and ladder work at hill giants cave?
channel.description: I cannot get the door or ladder to work, i used no clip to get through, but the ladder wouldnt send me down there? Please help! Urgent!

item.title: How to make door and ladder work at hill giants cave?
item.dc:creator: @ProjectSix ProjectSix
item.description:
@ProjectSix wrote:

Or you dont need even add emote just put it as portal and put ladder id.
Door alrdy explained.

item.title: How to make door and ladder work at hill giants cave?
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

there are 2 options u got here. first u can press examine option on the object , go to objects list , and paste what the examine said. and u’ll probably find the objects id. the second way is for you to check your sources run.bat it should say the objects id , x coords and y coords , both ways are easy.

Read full topic
